title: She's Thinking Of Becoming A Sugar Baby...What Does She Need To Know?
description:
She's got a friend through work who told her he'd be her sugar daddy...and she's thinking of taking him up on it! 

He's twice her age, divorced, and has kids older than her, but she knows he'd actually be a really kind and caring partner. Before she jumps in, she's got some questions from Bert Show listeners who already *have* sugar daddies...

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
